restaurants.name: Miraž
restaurants.recommendation: You must try the kebab at this popular spot known for its delicious grilled dishes.

restaurants.name: Pesochnica
restaurants.recommendation: You must try all from waffles to burgers at this trendy food court offering a variety of street food options.

restaurants.name: DEPO
restaurants.recommendation: You must try the crepes at this cozy café known for its delightful sweet and savory treats.

restaurants.name: Lido
restaurants.recommendation: You must try the home-made dishes at this popular restaurant offering traditional Belarusian cuisine.

restaurants.name: Enzo
restaurants.recommendation: You must try the Enzo Burger, Texas Burger, and steaks at this hip eatery known for its gourmet burgers.

restaurants.name: Pinky Bandinsky
restaurants.recommendation: You must try dinner at this chic restaurant offering a creative menu and a stylish atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Vasilki
restaurants.recommendation: You must try draniki, kolduny, pancakes, shank, and “Olivier” salad at this restaurant known for its authentic Belarusian dishes.

museums.name: The National Art Museum
museums.recommendation: One of the largest museums in Eastern Europe, housing a vast collection of Belarusian and international art.

museums.name: Y Gallery
museums.recommendation: A contemporary art gallery showcasing innovative works by Belarusian and international artists.

museums.name: Cultural Center Korpus
museums.recommendation: A vibrant cultural hub hosting a variety of events, including exhibitions, concerts, and performances.

museums.name: Art Belarus Gallery
museums.recommendation: Dedicated to Belarusian art, this gallery features works from the early 20th century to the present day.

museums.name: The Azgur Museum and Studio
museums.recommendation: A museum and workshop of the famous Belarusian sculptor Zair Azgur, showcasing his life and works.

museums.name: Ў Gallery of Contemporary Art
museums.recommendation: A leading space for contemporary art in Belarus, featuring exhibitions, performances, and discussions.

museums.name: The Great Patriotic War Museum
museums.recommendation: A must-visit for history enthusiasts, this museum offers a comprehensive view of Belarus' role in World War II.

hotels.name: Minsk Marriott Hotel
hotels.recommendation: A luxury hotel offering comfortable accommodations, dining options, and a spa.

hotels.name: Hotel Europe
hotels.recommendation: A historic hotel in the heart of Minsk, known for its elegant rooms and excellent service.

hotels.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Minsk
hotels.recommendation: A modern hotel with contemporary amenities, dining options, and scenic views of the city.

hotels.name: Renaissance Minsk Hotel
hotels.recommendation: A stylish hotel featuring luxurious rooms, a wellness center, and convenient access to local attractions.

shops.name: GUM
shops.recommendation: A major department store offering a wide range of goods, from clothing to electronics.

shops.name: TSUM
shops.recommendation: A large shopping center with various stores, including fashion, cosmetics, and home goods.

shops.name: Komarovski Market
shops.recommendation: An iconic market where you can buy fresh produce, local delicacies, and various goods.
